title: When some boosted Animal talks smack about Mordekaiser to Malicious Metal.

replies.body:
You may only need to hit me **once**. . .

{{item:1001}} but you still **need** to hit me. ;p

http://68.media.tumblr.com/52d0c4cc0a489667dd89fcb329e17352/tumblr_ofuucpWPQp1relaado1_400.gif

waiting for Morde's vgu be like

> http://www.welovewhq.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/skeleton-computer1.jpg

How do you think he felt when he was waiting for his liches to revive him when he lost his skull in his lore?
Every single time i see a Mord thread i get reminded of his rework yet to come ;-;

guys there is a good side to everything. 
Morde is still good in bronze.
i'm thinking of the morde gets a girlfriend comic right now.
You mean he's not dating kalista?
washed up champion for washed up players.they should release a rusty skin for morderkaiser to show how washed up he is.
That would call too much attention to his rusty code. . .
